==Usage in Story Maps==
{{#cargo_query:tables=MapUnits=MU,Units=U,Skills=S
|fields=CONCAT('[[',MU._pageName,'{{!}}{{(}}#invoke:GetFancyMapName{{!}}getFancyName{{!}}',MU._pageName,'{{)}}]] — {{(}}Ut{{!}}',U.WikiName,'{{)}}')

}}
==Seal acquired from==
* This is a story exclusive Sacred Seal. It is exclusively equipped by {{Ht|Gullveig: Golden Seer}} in [[:Category:Defensive battle maps|defensive battle maps]].
